sentences.en: Aspirin should be avoided if you have a stomach (peptic) ulcer, haemophilia or other bleeding disorder, or an allergy to aspirin or to other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID).
sentences.cn: 如果你有胃（消化道）溃疡，血友病或者其它出血性疾病，或对阿司匹林或其他非甾体抗炎药过敏（类固醇消炎药），应避免服用阿司匹林。

sentences.en: These are genetic disorders that only affect males normally. They are things like muscular dystrophy and haemophilia.
sentences.cn: 这些遗传病通常只发生在男性身上，如肌肉萎缩、血友病等。

trans.tran_en: a serious disease that prevents a person’s blood from becoming thick, so that they lose a lot of blood easily if they are injured
